thread.title: Man who spray-painted anti-Muslim graffiti, 'Donald Trump' on church building gets probation
thread.title_full: Man who spray-painted anti-Muslim graffiti, 'Donald Trump' on church building gets probation

author: Michaelangelo Conte | The Jersey Journal
title: Man who spray-painted anti-Muslim graffiti, 'Donald Trump' on church building gets probation
text: The Bayonne man charged with spray-painting anti-Muslim graffiti and "Donald Trump" on a building used by the local Muslim community on church property was sentenced to 12 months probation today.
